title: WIll ASUS ZENBOOK UX433FN-A5056T run League smoothly?
body:
Hey there, first of all I have 0 experience in terms of laptops etc, however I need a new laptop for college and I was thinking about buying ASUS ZENBOOK UX433FN-A5056T (Intel Core i5 8265 Whiskey Lake, 14" LED 1920Ã—1080, RAM 8GB LPDDR3, NVIDIA GeForce MX150 2GB GDDR5, M.2 SSD 256GB, WiFi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 5.0,  HDMI, USB 3.1 Gen 1, USB-C 3.1 Gen 2,  battery 50Wh, Windows 10 Home 64-bit). 

It seems almost perfect for school and productive work however, I wonder if It will run league smoothly. Any advice?
